QuestData.Title: Deephive Decimation
QuestData.Description:
A sect of the mantid swarm calling themselves the "Deephive" have taken hold of the Big Blossom mine. These mantid have fully given themselves up to the Old Gods' corruption, making them especially dangerous.
We cannot allow the Deephive to run amok in the Vale. Do what must be done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Deephive mantid within the Big Blossom Mine in Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
